channel.title: People can't log on my server
channel.description:
I had this problem before.. But i don't know how to fix it now. ive noticed it when i was trying to post my server on runelocus but then it said they couldnt connect.
Heres the picture:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/28klvd3.png[/img]
http://i45.tinypic.com/28klvd3.png
If you can't read it, it says "We could not connect to your server. Are you sure it's online, and that you are not blocking connections from 217.23.15.196 ? "
Now to make sure it didn't work i tried it on my other computer and it didn't log me in so that made me know 100% that it didn't work. Yes i have a no-ip, Yes im using the right ip, Yes im using the right client... Can someone tell me how to fix it?

item.title: People can't log on my server
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

well you have portforward but do you have no-ip running and your serevr running when you try it?

Read full topic
item.source: People can't log on my server

item.title: People can't log on my server
item.dc:creator: @wild_blood36 wild blood36
item.description:
@wild_blood36 wrote:

[quote=“billyjr33, post:6, topic:342849”]death is right yous need to port forward so your server is online so everyone can get on it.

port forward is easy but it depends on what router you have.

if you have belkin as a router well ill be able to help you but if not try asking other people ok[/quote]

Hey man… I have Belkin, and i went onto the belkin page and went to firewall settings, and then virtual servers and added both a tcp and udp… and i went on canyouseeme.org and it could see my port and it was working, and i also did pfportchecker and it said it was working… but when i went to upload it on runelocus i got the same message… please help me man. again i have Belkin

Read full topic
item.source: People can't log on my server

@billyjr33 wrote:

death is right yous need to port forward so your server is online so everyone can get on it.

port forward is easy but it depends on what router you have.

if you have belkin as a router well ill be able to help you but if not try asking other people ok

^

  • Try to kill the javac process in your tskmng & start your server again.
    & Have you refreshed your no-ip client ?

I had this problem before… But i don’t know how to fix it now. ive noticed it when i was trying to post my server on runelocus but then it said they couldnt connect.
